attributes.additional_details: They are a hazard to humans and animals. The float off with no control over where they land, meaning they can cause fires to farmland, homes and property. If they go out over the sea, they then become a hazard to marine life and add the the already mounting pollution of our seas and oceans.
attributes.background: Ban the selling and use of sky lanterns

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310556
